basics.name: Mohammad Yavari
basics.label: Computer Engineering Student
basics.summary: A dedicated computer engineering student with a passion for technology and innovation.

work.name: Tech University
work.summary: Pursuing a degree in Computer Engineering, actively involved in coursework and projects.

references.name: Professor Jane Smith
references.reference: Mohammad is a dedicated and enthusiastic student, always eager to explore new concepts in computer engineering. His passion for technology is evident in his coursework and projects.

references.name: Dr. Michael Johnson
references.reference: I have had the pleasure of mentoring Mohammad in a hardware design project. His problem-solving skills and attention to detail were commendable, contributing significantly to the project's success.

projects.name: Smart Home Automation System
projects.summary: Developed a system to automate home devices using microcontrollers and IoT technologies.
